title: Transhealth Primary Care Integrated Education

context.prior_knowledge: Foundational medical knowledge and comprehension of primary care procedures
context.additional_context: Project-based learning using digital devices, focusing on integrating transhealth knowledge into existing medical systems.

learning_goals: Enhance ability to develop care plans reflecting physiological and psychological characteristics of transgender and non-binary patients
Develop case-based problem-solving skills integrating transgender health knowledge into existing clinical protocols
Acquiring Communication Skills for Respecting the Rights of Transgender Individuals in Multicultural Environments
difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
